summary: Iteration 13: All requested features verified working - Admin orders page displays orders correctly (blank page bug fixed), Admin products page with Add Product functionality works, Admin analytics endpoint returns comprehensive data, AfroVending logo appears on all pages (login, admin dashboard, vendor dashboard, homepage header), Service categories display on homepage.

minor.issue: Console shows 404 errors when accessing vendor dashboard with vendor@afrovending.com - vendor data fetch failing

issues: Minor: Console warning about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement needed

critical_code_review_comments: AdminOrders.jsx fix verified: response.data.orders is correctly used to extract orders array
AdminProducts.jsx correctly implements Add Product functionality with proper form fields
Admin analytics endpoint at /api/admin/analytics returns comprehensive data including top_vendors, top_products, daily_stats
Logo correctly references /logo.png which exists in /app/frontend/public/
Service categories fetched via GET /api/categories?type=service and displayed on homepage
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin features working: orders page shows 3 orders, products page shows 16 products with Add Product dialog, analytics dashboard shows comprehensive stats. Logo visible on login page, admin dashboard, vendor dashboard. Service categories (14 total) and product categories both display on homepage.

admin_orders_page_blank_fix.details: Orders table displays correctly with Order ID, Date, Items, Total, Status, Payment columns. Shows 3 orders.

admin_products_page_add_product.details: Add Product button visible, dialog opens with all form fields (name, vendor, price, category, stock, etc), Create Product button functional

admin_analytics_endpoint.details: GET /api/admin/analytics returns summary, growth rates, top_vendors, top_products, daily_stats, category_performance

logo_on_login_page.details: AfroVending logo (img[alt='AfroVending']) visible on login page

logo_on_admin_dashboard.details: AfroVending logo visible in admin dashboard header

logo_on_vendor_dashboard.details: AfroVending logo visible in vendor dashboard header

service_categories_homepage.details: 14 service categories displayed in 'Browse Services' section including Event and Decor, Fashion Designing, Catering Services, etc.

product_categories_homepage.details: Product categories displayed in 'Shop by Category' section including Fashion, Art & Crafts, Food & Groceries, etc.

product_detail_page.details: Product detail page loads correctly with Add to Cart button working

add_to_cart_guest.details: Add to Cart works for guest users with 'Added to cart' toast notification
